body:
This PR implements translations for Chinese, Russian, and English languages. Additionally, it includes a minor enhancement to the splash screen to expedite navigation upon user interaction.

Changes:
- Implemented translations for Chinese, Russian, and English languages.
- Updated the splash screen to facilitate faster navigation upon user interaction.
- Enhanced user experience by displaying translated language options.
- Addressed minor issues to ensure smooth operation.

These changes enhance the internationalization of the application while improving the user experience during initial navigation.
